verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Revive Thy work, O Lord,! Thy mighty arm make bare; Speak with the voice that wakes the dead, And make Thy people hear.

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: Revive Thy work, O Lord! Disturb this sleep of death; Quicken the smould'ring embers now By Thine almighty breath.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Revive Thy work, O Lord! Create soul-thirst for Thee; And hung'ring for the Bread of Life Oh, may our spirits be!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Revive Thy work, O Lord! Exalt Thy precious name; And, by the Holy Ghost, our love For Thee and Thine inflame.
